children.name: showIn

parameters.name: transitionClass `string`
parameters.description: Optional. If provided, the new view will replace the current one with a [replace effect](/framework/fx/replace).

parameters.name: view `kendo.View`
parameters.description: The view instance that will be rendered.

parameters.name: container `String`
parameters.description: The selector of the container in which the view element will be appended.

children.description: Renders the **View** element in the element specified by the selector
